Description: Lower body sherd of Chian, possibly Mature Animal Style, pottery chalice; glaze fired orange-brown; white slip; interior glazed, with two pairs of added white bands; exterior: three glaze bands; inscription on exterior.
Bibliographic references: Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (pl. 21.1.32)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0450) (phase 2)
